question: A and B together can do a piece of work in 5 days and A alone can do it in 8 days, then B alone can do the same piece of work in :
explanation:
(A + B)\'s 1 day\'s work $latex =\\frac{1}{5}&s=1$
A\'s 1 day\'s work $latex =\\frac{1}{8}&s=1$
∴ B\'s 1 day\'s work $latex =\\frac{1}{5}-\\frac{1}{8}=\\frac{8-5}{40}=\\frac{3}{40}&s=1$
∴ B alone will complete the work in $latex \\frac{40}{3}=13\\tfrac{1}{3}\\ days&s=1$.
Hence option [B] is correct answer.<
